meanings.definition: The act of moving something from its usual place
meanings.sent1: The displacement of the vase from the shelf was accidental.
meanings.sent2: The displacement of the furniture during the renovation made the room feel different.
meanings.sent3: The displacement of the cat from its favorite spot on the couch caused a comical chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: The displacement of the puzzle pieces from their original positions made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent5: The sudden displacement of the sand by the waves created a new pattern on the beach.

meanings.definition: The amount by which something is moved from its original position
meanings.sent1: The displacement of the car in the parking lot was only a few inches.
meanings.sent2: The displacement of the marker on the whiteboard was barely noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The displacement of the cookie from the plate was so small, it went unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: The displacement of the needle on the scale indicated a slight change in weight.
meanings.sent5: The displacement of the rock from the edge of the cliff was a warning of potential danger.

meanings.definition: The removal of someone or something from a place or situation
meanings.sent1: The displacement of the employee from the project team was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The displacement of the tree from the garden was necessary for construction.
meanings.sent3: The displacement of the book from the shelf led to a surprising discovery behind it.
meanings.sent4: The displacement of the student from the classroom caused a stir among the classmates.
meanings.sent5: The displacement of the boat from the dock marked the beginning of a new journey.
